name: Listened to THE ATHENS TRAMPOLINE CHOWDER SOCIAL, AND OTHER TALES OF ROMANTIC VICTORY

content.html:
SHOW NOTES We asked for your stories of romantic triumph, and almost all of you sent something that resembles that! Good job! The first story is also the best story, so if you really want to you can bail after that Chili’s has run out of history The fusion cuisine that ended a three-year relationship Why women crave zeta males Ideal public settings for testing the big spoon/little spoon dynamic John Cena first-date fashion Can’t spell GREASE 2 without a bigole G What’s the best place to puke on a date? Learn the romantic history behind Ryan’s grandmother’s wifi password A number of high-success methods for kidnapping Spencer Scenes From An Abandoned Italian Restaurant Surber is unleashed Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

By Shutdown Fullcast
